alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:34AM EDT until March 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Rain and freezing rain transitioning to snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and additional ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
